title: Readout of the Vice President’s Meeting with President Ghani of the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
February 18, 2017
Vice President Pence met in Munich today with President Ashraf Ghani of the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan. The Vice President expressed support for the National Unity Government. The leaders discussed opportunities to strengthen the bilateral relationship and advance mutual interests, particularly in the areas of counterterrorism cooperation and economic development. Both leaders also affirmed the continued importance of the strategic partnership between the United States and Afghanistan.
